pages.title: Uses for your smeltery:
pages.text: Melt weeping vines for molten copper, and twisting vines for molten zinc. $(br)$(o)There are weeping vines under the spawn island$(br)$(br)$()Melt blackstone to get liquid seared stone, cast onto more blackstone to get andesite.$(br)$(br)Pour molten zinc onto a tall mystical white flower to get a pure daisy, and then you can get started with Botania!
